title: A Look back at Season 1 of the Ms. Pat Show!
description:
Season 2 of the Ms. PAt show is available now. This week we are taking it back to the launch of Season 1. Ms Pat and Jordan Cooper discuss the making of the show and how often he'd write in jokes to mess with the cast. 

Start your free trial for BET Plus here: https://www.bet.plus/
